content: उदासीन {%<ab>pres. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Indifferent, unconcerned, apathetic, passive; तद्दर्शिनमुदासींनं त्वामेव पुरुष विदुः <ls>Ku. 2. 13</ls> (taking no part in the creation of the material universe); see सांख्य; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} (In law) Not involved in any dispute. {@--3@} Neutral (as a king or nation). --नः {@--1@} A stranger. {@--2@} A neutral, an indifferent person; अरिमित्रोदासीनव्यवस्था <ls>Mu. 5</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 158</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 345</ls>; <ls>Bg. 6. 9.</ls> {@--3@} A common acquaintance.
